feed.title: SAP Community - API Management
feed.subtitle: API Management Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Issue Adding or Removing Proxies from Product in SAP API Management – Screen Keeps Loading
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m facing an issue in SAP API Management and would appreciate your help or insights.

I’ve created several API Proxies for my SAP CPI system and also created a Product. When I try to assign proxies to the Product:

  • For some proxies, it works fine, and I’m able to add them successfully.

  • For other proxies, the screen keeps loading indefinitely and never completes the assignment process.

Here’s what I’ve tried so far:

✅ I recreated and redeployed the problematic proxies.
✅ I tested the proxies directly in the browser — they work fine when called.
✅ I tried performing the assignment in Incognito mode and in different browsers.
✅ I even tried removing previously assigned proxies, but the UI again keeps loading endlessly during the remove operation.

Despite all this, the issue persists. It seems like there might be an internal problem in API Management, possibly some stuck metadata or backend inconsistency, but I’m not certain.

Has anyone experienced a similar issue?

  • Is there any workaround to force-remove a proxy from a Product (e.g. via REST APIs)?

  • Is there a way to clean up potentially stuck objects in API Management?

  • Any logs or places to check for deeper troubleshooting?

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance for your support.

#

entry.title: Issue Adding or Removing Proxies from Product in SAP API Management – Screen Keeps Loading
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m facing an issue in SAP API Management and would appreciate your help or insights.

I’ve created several API Proxies for my SAP CPI system and also created a Product. When I try to assign proxies to the Product:

  • For some proxies, it works fine, and I’m able to add them successfully.

  • For other proxies, the screen keeps loading indefinitely and never completes the assignment process.

Here’s what I’ve tried so far:

✅ I recreated and redeployed the problematic proxies.
✅ I tested the proxies directly in the browser — they work fine when called.
✅ I tried performing the assignment in Incognito mode and in different browsers.
✅ I even tried removing previously assigned proxies, but the UI again keeps loading endlessly during the remove operation.

Despite all this, the issue persists. It seems like there might be an internal problem in API Management, possibly some stuck metadata or backend inconsistency, but I’m not certain.

Has anyone experienced a similar issue?

  • Is there any workaround to force-remove a proxy from a Product (e.g. via REST APIs)?

  • Is there a way to clean up potentially stuck objects in API Management?

  • Any logs or places to check for deeper troubleshooting?

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance for your support.

entry.title: any standard API to export invoice attachment from SAP system and send to external service provider
entry.content:
any standard API to export invoice attachment from SAP system and send to external service provider?

In concur system -

The VAT IT App is an “standard offering” by SAP Concur and VAT IT (= SAP Concur Partner) and this app is offered in the App Center within Concur T&E (CTE). This is what we have enabled in CTE for SAP Concur system.

As this VAT IT App/the API is used to connect to the CTE system/tenant (to read data of SAP’s employees from the CTE databases), we would like same functionality / this API to pull data from other SAP system (Non Concur system)?

entry.title: Extend standard API API_CONDITION_CONTRACT
entry.content:
Hello,

I m on Premise 2023 FPS00 and I want to use the standard API API_CONDITION_CONTRACT. Unfortunately no extensibility is supported as specified in the documentation. I need to add custom fields to the API . Ideally I would like also to add the standard structure WCOCOI which is not yet supported but it is a component of the condition contract. 

What is the recommendation to add the custom fields when no extensibility is available?

  • Copy the standard API and add the custom fields?
  • Enhance the standard CDS views and use implicit enhancement in the Behavior Implementation?
  • Create our own API 

@Andre_Fischer maybe you can help.

Thank you

Christophe

entry.title: SAP API PROXY principal propagation error 403
entry.content:
Greetings SAP community,

I have been trying to expose an ODATA service on our on-premsis ECC system through Integration Suite's API Proxy.

I configured all the nesscary steps between BTP and SCC, SCC and the back-end system so that the identity is forwarded to SCC and then to the back-end system by X.509.

I have confirmed that Principal Propagation works as i use it in a Destination Configuration with SAP Graph and it forwards the identity correctly, requests are executed sucessfully.

However when i try to send a request through API Proxy, i recieve an error 403. API Management isnt exactly clear on how the request should be sent to the proxy, whether it should contain a specific header or a token. I have tried to send the JWT recieved from the OAUTH server for an Integration Flow client in the Authorization Header, still getting the same 403 error.

The API provider created for the proxy uses Authentication type "Principal Propagation".

I would appreciate help in this matter.

entry.title: Control by Field Status Variant when executing Journal Entry - Post (Synchronous)
entry.content:
Dear All,

When I run Journal Entry - Post (Synchronous), does the control of  Field Status Variant per account work?
I tried it and it didn't work, so I would like to check.

Example:

When Cost Center is hidden, if you try to go to register Cost Center with the API, it will be registered.
Ideally, Cost Center would not be registered, but would be posted without error.

Best Regards,

Yuki Tsumura

entry.title: When will the materials API be released? it is now in BETA version
entry.content:
Hi,

My customer would like to use this API https://api.sap.com/api/SIA_Material/overview

to update material characteristics into S/4HANA Private Cloud.  More specifically this one: https://api.sap.com/api/SIA_Material/path/patch_CharacteristicValues__ID__

The API is still in BETA release. What are the plans to make this API public released?

Many thanks for your support! Kind regards, Goedele

entry.content:

I create a Sales Order(Sales Order Type:CCPU) in S4 and send the data to an external system via API integration.I am able to retrieve Sales Order data using the Custom API, but the Event is not triggered and the data is not being sent.

Do you know what the cause is?

Soma

entry.title: "Error Occured while plotting the chart" - Custom View in SAP APIM
entry.content:
Hi Team,

we are getting an error while monitoring the custom view dashboard in SAP APIM.

While navigating through the Custom_error_text1 (Error_Message in API) --> Custom_error_time (error_time of the API) we are getting the above error. 

Queries : 

1. Does the dimension have any hierarchy maintained in the backend ?If so do we have any sap document?

2. What could be the cause/meaning of this error! 

We would like to monitor the error messages in the SAP APIM through dashboard where we stuck with this, a response would be a great support for us ! 

Thanks and Regards,

Vaisu Raj

entry.title: I can't create an API provider (cloud connector)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community.

When I try to create an API provider with Cloud connector option I give details about Management Host, Authentication Basic and use my GmailID and password of my sap trial account, it throws me this exception: System is up and reachable. However, the ping check responded with code: 401; Message: Unauthorized.

I have logged into my account with the same GmailID and password, and when i go to manage profile and try to change the password by giving my current password it throws an exception saying: Could not be verified. 

Note: The password works when I log into my trial account.

Any help is much appreciated.

entry.title: Developing with SAP Integration Suite - API Proxy Error
entry.content:
Hi,

 

I am currently working through the learning journey "Developing with SAP Integration Suite" but I am having issues when it comes to API policies. As per the training, I have created the API provider and API proxy and I am now applying policies to the API proxy. I have set up the "Assign Message" policy, named setCredentials, and the "Basic Authentication" policy named setBasicAuthentication. Within the setCredentials policy, I have assigned the username and password variables to my username and password used to log into the SAP GUI HTML Test system (Logon - https://sapes5.sapdevcenter.com/)

 

Within the training, when you go to resources within the the API to get the Product Set, it returns a code 200 server response.

However, for my API I am receiving a 401 error.

 

Is there something incorrect about my API setup that might cause this error? From the body response, it points to incorrect credentials but my policy setup seems correct. Has anyone seen this before?

 

Appreciate any help on this.

entry.title: How to fetch Profit Segment in FB60 Invoice posting in S4 Private Cloud
entry.content:
Hi there, 

I am in S4 Hana Private Cloud FPS 2023 Release 02 (Oct 2024). 

I need to post thru API JournalEntryCreateRequestConfirmation_In

I am able to post a simple Journal entry, without profit segment. If my expense line is hitting P&L account, I have Product and Profit Center, with which I need to derive Profit Segment for various COPA characteristics. How can I ensure I am passing all relevant fields within the API so the Profit Segment is deriving properly. 

When I pass the API thru Postman test for instance, I am succeeding to push the API, still, I am NOT seeing the document posted already. It takes a while to dig deep based on each type of error and trouble-shoot them one by one. 

I checked in other forums, I get different feedback that I am not clear, to determine what I am indeed missing. 

Can someone suggest appropriate steps in sequence, please? That would be helpful. 

Regards Siva

entry.title: Real Estate Contract management: How to maintain Notes
entry.content:
Problem Statement - Want to create or update Notes for real estate contract for each node like posting term, conditions etc.

Business Scenario:  We want to build a custom utility to create or update the Memo or Notes section of real estate contract using ABAP on S4 HANA Public cloud

Expected Solution - Solution to create or edit memo/notes long text fields on real estate contract

Please let us know if there is a way in SAP CLM Cloud version where we can create or edit memo/notes.

SAP Real Estate Management SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP Sourcing and SAP Contract Lifecycle Management

entry.title: LMS Expert! Please guide - Scheduled offerings Question
entry.content: I am working on retrieving all scheduled offerings from SF LMS. I found the following API, but it requires an instructorID as input: /learning/odatav4/public/admin/scheduledoffering-service/v1/ScheduledToTeachClasses?$filter=sttcCriteria/fromDate eq 1756473000000 and sttcCriteria/toDate eq 1856498200000 and sttcCriteria/instructorID eq 'instructorID' &expand=segments($select=*)&$select=* The challenge is that to get all scheduled offerings, I would need to call this API for every instructorID. However, I haven’t been able to find any API that provides a list of instructorIDs. Has anyone come across a way to retrieve instructorIDs, or is there an alternative approach to get all scheduled offerings without filtering by instructorID?

entry.title: Best Practices for Enforcing API Governance for Applications Co-located with S/4HANA in Same Cloud I
entry.content:
I have an architectural question regarding API governance and security:

Current Scenario:

  • S/4HANA On-Premise system deployed in AWS cloud infrastructure
  • External applications accessing S/4HANA On-Premise OData/APIs are properly governed through:
    • SAP Cloud Connector (for BTP applications)
    • API Management (for external platform applications)

Challenge: Applications deployed in the same AWS infrastructure as S/4HANA On-Premise can potentially access the OData services/APIs directly, bypassing any API governance layer. This creates a security and governance gap. 

 Questions:

  1. What are the recommended approaches to ensure all API access to S/4HANA On-Premise is properly governed, even for co-located applications?
  2. Are there any reference architectures or best practices for implementing API governance within the same cloud infrastructure
  3. How can we enforce the use of API Management or similar governance layer for applications in the same network?

    Any guidance, documentation links, or reference architectures would be greatly appreciated.

    Thanks in advance !


    [Attached simplified architecture diagram showing the scenario]

entry.title: Will people still able to access my iflow even after I expose via API Management's Proxy?
entry.content:
Hi,

API management's Proxy is able to discover CI iflow and act as a layer and adding a security that can be implemented via some API policies (access control, etc). Therefore, we are exposing the API proxy's URL instead of the iflow endpoint's URL.

However, if someone knows the iflow endpoint's URL, does that mean the person can bypass the API proxy and access the iflow directly?

 

Thank you.

entry.title: How To CheckIn URL Attachment with API_CV_ATTACHMENT_SRV CreateUrlAsAttachment
entry.content:
Hi All, 

With this API I can successfully create URL Original in the Document Info Record, However that created URL Original is not checked In, How to do CheckIn with this API ? I dont see any parameter in this API to do CheckIn ? Is there any Other API which could do CheckIn as well ?

Enclosed the Successful Call with which the URL Original was created.

https://server:44300/sap/opu/odata/sap/API_CV_ATTACHMENT_SRV/CreateUrlAsAttachment?BusinessObjectTypeName='DRAW'&LinkedSAPObjectKey='ART000000000000005000000002701000'&Url='https://test.com'&UrlDescription='Link'&MIMEType='text/url'

As it can be seen in the Screenshot below, the Original was not locked, which means it is not checked In. 

Any Hint, how can i achieve this Lock along with the creation of the URL attachment.

 

 

BR,

Ketan

entry.title: OData API Reference for Phone Numbers in SuccessFactors
entry.content:
Hello Experts

I am looking for an OData API Reference currently available in SAP SuccessFactors. I am planning to create an integration for which I need to know the structure of the employee phone record in SuccessFactors. For this I am in need of a reference as to what is currently available in OData API for phone numbers.

Please suggest where can I get the documentation / reference for OData API for phone numbers.

Thanks in advance

Arul

entry.title: Provision of Sales Cloud V2 APIs via Integration Suite and Cloud Connector for on-prem clients
entry.content:
Dear colleagues,

As part of our ongoing platform transformation, we are migrating to Sales Cloud V2 and S/4HANA. Initial testing within our sandbox environment has confirmed successful access to the Sales Cloud V2 APIs.

For productive use, we aim to establish a secure and scalable integration architecture by leveraging SAP Integration Suite in conjunction with the Cloud Connector. This setup is intended to enable on-premise clients to proactively consume Sales Cloud V2 APIs.

The envisioned scenario involves external calls initiated from on-prem systems, with responses returned from the cloud — for example, accessing data related to the Business Partner object.

We would like to validate whether this architecture is technically feasible and aligns with best practices for hybrid connectivity and secure API exposure.

entry.title: API Call API_MAINTAINANCEORDER ends with HTTP RC 423 and message "Billable Order 4001380 is not sup
entry.content:
In SAP Note 3330419 (3330419 - Release-Informationen und -Einschränkungen in Bezug auf SAP S/4HANA Service - SAP for Me )  is described that for if you flag a maintenance order as billable 

is described that ar least with S/4HANA Service 2023 FPS3 it is not possible to create or change a billable flagged maintainance order via API.

Are they any plans in the SAP roadmap to enhance the API to make it possible ?
